buyer.official_name: Kildare and Wicklow Education and Training Board

procedure.title: Invitation to Tender for Contractor Works services for accessibility works at Colaiste Bhride Carnew Co Wicklow
procedure.description:
**Title: Invitation to Tender for Contractor Works Services for Accessibility Works at Colaiste Bhride Carnew, Co. Wicklow**

**Description:**
The Kildare and Wicklow Education and Training Board (KWETB) invites bids for the provision of contractor works services to enhance accessibility at Colaiste Bhride Carnew, Co. Wicklow. The works will involve the following:

1. **Provision of New Automated Doors with Access Control in Existing Glazed Screen to the Front of the Building:**
   - The successful bidder will be responsible for installing new automated doors with access control systems to ensure seamless and secure entry for all users. This includes integrating the doors with existing security systems and ensuring compliance with current accessibility standards.

2. **Minor Improvements to Existing Accessible Toilets:**
   - The contractor will undertake minor improvements to the existing accessible toilets, including upgrading fixtures and fittings to meet modern accessibility requirements. This may include installing grab rails, improving lighting, and ensuring that all facilities are fully compliant with disability access standards.

**Key Considerations:**
- **Quality of Work:** The contractor must demonstrate a high level of expertise in accessibility works, with a proven track record of delivering similar projects.
- **Compliance with Regulations:** The bidder must ensure that all works comply with relevant Irish and EU accessibility regulations, including the Disability Act 2005 and the European Union's Accessibility Act.
- **Safety Measures:** The contractor must implement robust safety measures during the execution of the works to protect both staff and students.
- **Timely Completion:** The bidder should provide a detailed project timeline and ensure that the works are completed within the specified timeframe to minimize disruption to educational activities.
- **Maintenance and Support:** The contractor should provide a maintenance plan for the installed systems, ensuring that they remain functional and accessible over time.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
- **Technical Competence:** The bidder's experience in similar accessibility projects, including their ability to meet regulatory requirements.
- **Quality of Proposal:** Clarity, completeness, and coherence of the proposal, including detailed methodologies and timelines.
- **Price:** The total cost of the project, including all materials, labor, and any additional services required.
- **Health and Safety Record:** The bidder's health and safety record, including any previous incidents or accidents related to similar projects.
- **References:** Previous clients or projects that demonstrate the bidder's capability in delivering high-quality accessibility works.

By responding to this tender, the successful bidder will contribute to enhancing the educational environment at Colaiste Bhride Carnew, ensuring that all students and staff have equal access to facilities and services. The KWETB is committed to providing inclusive and accessible education, and this project is a critical step towards achieving this goal.

lots.title: Invitation to Tender for Contractor Works services for accessibility works at Colaiste Bhride Carnew Co Wicklow
lots.description: The works will involve the provision new 1. Automated Doors with Access Control in existing Glazed Screen to front of building and 2. Minor Improvements to existing Accessible Toilet.
